headline: Does Fortive’s New CE-Marked Sterilization Cycle Deepen Its Healthcare Recurring Revenue Story (FTV)?
summary: In early February 2025, ASP GmbH, a division of Fortive, and FUJIFILM Healthcare Europe announced that the ULTRA GI™ Cycle for the STERRAD™ 100NX Sterilizer with ALLClear™ Technology had received CE mark approval, expanding hydrogen peroxide–based sterilization options aimed at improving patient safety and device compatibility across European healthcare settings. This regulatory milestone underscores Fortive’s push into higher-value healthcare sterilization solutions that can deepen customer...
